'''Red Cedar Scroll Shelf''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Blueprint: Red Cedar Scroll Shelf is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Fragrant Cedar Wood = 12
|Red Dye = 6
|sort = Fragrant Cedar Wood;Red Dye
}}
